p: Rosin-derived binapthyl-appended 22-crown-6 ether can be synthesized from methyl maleopimarate, sodium borate and sodium hydride according to Scheme 37 [ 184]. It can be used in highly enantioselective reactions because of its amines enantiomeric recognition ability [ 184]. Very similar compounds can be also synthesized directly from maleopimaric or fumaropimaric acid [ 201].
